products.title: The Shawshank Redemption
products.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

products.title: Back to the Future
products.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

products.title: Inception 3
products.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
